dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev was in Shymkent yesterday for an agricultural exhibition, and he got a look at some pretty ambitious investment projects.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev was in Shymkent yesterday for an agricultural exhibition, and he got a look at some pretty ambitious investment projects.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev attended an agricultural exhibition in Shymkent, citing Akorda. During the event, Tokayev was presented with investment projects, including Turkish company Alarko Holding's $650 million greenhouse complex and a $136 million facility by Polish enterprise Fabe Polska SP.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I saw that—Turkish company Alarko Holding is planning a huge greenhouse complex, like, a 650 million dollar one. That's massive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I saw that-Turkish company Alarko Holding is planning a huge greenhouse complex, like, a six hundred fifty million dollar one. That's massive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the event, Tokayev was presented with investment projects, including Turkish company Alarko Holding's $650 million greenhouse complex and a $136 million facility by Polish enterprise Fabe Polska SP.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And there was another one from Poland, Fabe Polska, for 136 million. Shymkent's really becoming a hub for this stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And there was another one from Poland, Fabe Polska, for one hundred thirty six million. Shymkent's really becoming a hub for this stuff.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the event, Tokayev was presented with investment projects, including Turkish company Alarko Holding's $650 million greenhouse complex and a $136 million facility by Polish enterprise Fabe Polska SP.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting, right? The city already has around 50 processing enterprises, and they produced goods worth over 168 billion tenge just this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting, right? The city already has around fifty processing enterprises, and they produced goods worth over one hundred sixty eight billion tenge just this year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to officials, the city is currently home to around 50 processing enterprises, which together produced goods worth 168.5 billion tenge in 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the President's visit wasn't just about agriculture—he was there to review socio-economic development overall.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the President's visit wasn't just about agriculture-he was there to review socio-economic development overall.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Tokayev arrived in Shymkent on April 11 as part of a working visit to review the city's socio-economic development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, and he also had that special meeting earlier about global market changes, which, you know, ties into all this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, and he also had that special meeting earlier about global market changes, which, you know, ties into all this.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Akorda had announced a special meeting with the President, focusing on the changing situation in global markets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. He met with Prime Minister Bektenov and National Bank Chairman Suleimenov to talk economy, especially with energy prices dropping.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. He met with Prime Minister Bektenov and National Bank Chairman Suleimenov to talk economy, especially with energy prices dropping.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev held talks with Prime Minister Olzhas Bektenov, National Bank Chairman Timur Suleimenov, and other senior officials to discuss the state of the economy amid a sharp decline in energy and commodity prices triggered by global tariff disputes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is a big deal, 'cause global tariff disputes are really shaking things up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is a big deal, 'cause global tariff disputes are really shaking things up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev held talks with Prime Minister Olzhas Bektenov, National Bank Chairman Timur Suleimenov, and other senior officials to discuss the state of the economy amid a sharp decline in energy and commodity prices triggered by global tariff disputes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It sounds like they're trying to stay proactive, not reactive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It sounds like they're trying to stay proactive, not reactive.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Investing in agri-projects like these could help buffer some of those external shocks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Investing in agri-projects like these could help buffer some of those external shocks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And having international players like Turkey and Poland involved shows they're looking beyond just local partnerships.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And having international players like Turkey and Poland involved shows they're looking beyond just local partnerships.

dialogue_turns.text: Right, it's a smart move. Plus, Shymkent seems to be thriving with all this attention.

dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. I'm curious to see how these projects develop over the next couple years.
